name: crush-claw
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 50% chance to lower the target’s Defense by one stage.
short_effect: Has a 50% chance to lower the target’s Defense by one stage.

flavor_text.ruby-sapphire: Tears at the foe with sharp claws. May lower DEFENSE.
flavor_text.emerald: Tears at the foe with sharp claws. May lower DEFENSE.
flavor_text.firered-leafgreen: The foe is attacked with sharp claws. It may also lower the foe’s DEFENSE.
